pages.text: Welcome to $(thing)Sugar and Spice$()! This book will get you introduced to the basics so you can start having fun.$(br2)The information contained in the book is designed specifically to be short and sweet. Your game is paused while you're here if you're in singleplayer.

$(thing)Sugar and Spice$() is a vanilla-styled expansion modpack, where the basics are taken to the next level by expanding on creativity and adventure.$(br2)Please take a little bit of time to read the entries here in the $(thing)Welcome$() category - they'll get you up to speed with everything you need to know.
